value.name: Hawkins Police Blotter: Near tragedy involving dump truck, school bus results in felony charges
value.description: Police: Armed man “just shot up meth” Justin Lynn Wright, 32, 124 Bright Road, Church Hill, was arrested May 14 and charged with illegal possession of a handgun, possession of a handgun by an intoxicated person, two counts of drug possession and ...

value.name: Paris police officer tops grand jury’s May indictments
value.description: An indictment against a Paris police officer is one of 40 true bills handed down by the Lamar County Grand Jury on Thursday, according to information released by District Clerk

value.name: Several area thefts reported
value.description: Thefts have increased recently in the Hawkins County area. Chris Grizzel of Surgoinsville reported the theft of items worth an estimated total of almost $14,000 on May 12. Grizzel told officers that his ex-girlfriend came to his house and stole,
